mapper.select: select candidate_day.candidate_day,employee_master.emp_name,candidate_day.event_id from candidate_day left join vote_info on candidate_day.event_id = vote_info.event_id and candidate_day.candidate_day = vote_info.candidate_day left join employee_master on vote_info.vote_emp_num = employee_master.emp_num where candidate_day.event_id = #{id} order by candidate_day.candidate_day,employee_master.emp_num
